title: Bret Weinstein's Metaphorical Truth: Spirits as Pattern Initiators
description:
Bret Weinstein uses "Metaphysical Truth" to try to account for Religion (s) and to try to build a bridge between Jordan Peterson's Darwinian Truth and Sam Harris.  What is he trying to do with that? I think John Vervaeke's 4-P knowledge bridges the gap better.

Jordan Peterson, Sam Harris and Bret Weinstein Vancouver 1 https://youtu.be/d-Z9EZE8kpo
Jordan Peterson, Sam Harris and Bret Weinstein Vancouver 2 https://youtu.be/BtkwF5qA6uE
Are Spiritual Beings Merely Human Sourced? Vanderklips https://youtu.be/4wInNaOdLeI
